column4: Why doesn't pidgin let me send/receive files a lot of the time.
Why doesn't pidgin let me send/receive files a lot of the time. ( Version 2.5.2, ubuntu 8.10, protocol msn )
it seems to be a flaw of the software.  It happens on the Windows version as well.
Yes, Cluber, it does, and if the Pidgin team would fix that, well, I'd probably send them money.  Keep in mind that Pidgin-to-Pidgin works better than Pidgin-to-Messenger.
